actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 to require television broadcast station licensees to preview certain program material provided by national television broadcast networks.

summary.text: Amends the Communications Act of 1934 to require each television broadcast station licensee to, by contractual agreement, participate in a program, with the national television broadcast network with which such licensee is affiliated, which permits such licensee to view, not less than 30 days before the scheduled transmission of a program, any entertainment program material provided by such network which is intended for prime time viewing.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 to require television broadcast station licensees to preview certain program material provided by national television broadcast networks.
